question.text:
Match the column I and II and identify the correct option.
 
  Column I (Microbes)   Column-II (Use)
[A] Streptococcus (i) Biogas
[B] Methenobacterium (ii) Biofertilizer
[C] Azospirullum (iii) Ethanol
[D] Yeast (iv) Streptokinase

options.text: <math><mo>[</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>]</mo><mo>-</mo><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>[</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo>]</mo><mo>-</mo><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>[</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>]</mo><mo>-</mo><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>[</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi><mo>]</mo><mo>-</mo><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>)</mo></math>

<math><mo>[</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>]</mo><mo>-</mo><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>[</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo>]</mo><mo>-</mo><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>[</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>]</mo><mo>-</mo><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>[</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi><mo>]</mo><mo>-</mo><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo></math>

<math><mo>[</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>]</mo><mo>-</mo><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>[</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo>]</mo><mo>-</mo><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>[</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>]</mo><mo>-</mo><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>[</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi><mo>]</mo><mo>-</mo><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo></math>

solution.text: Streptokinase is used as a clot-buster is obtained from Streptococcus. Methanobacterium produces biogas by the anaerobic breakdown of organic matter. Azospirullum form a loose symbiosis with maize and is used as a biofertilizer. Yeast is used for commercial production of ethanol.
